skill.name: suggesting-tooling
skill.description:
Analyzes a codebase and suggests custom Claude Code skills and subagents to improve
development workflow. Use when user wants tooling suggestions, automation ideas, or
asks "what skills would help this project".
skill.summary:
Analyzes a codebase and suggests custom Claude Code skills and subagents to improve
development work...
skill.author: BrendanShields

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only documentation and pattern definitions. Shell commands referenced in documentation are for user execution, not automated by the skill. Read-only filesystem detection scoped to project directory.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to discover which custom tooling would benefit their workflow. This skill analyzes your codebase patterns and recommends skills and agents tailored to your project.
actual_capabilities: Detect programming languages and frameworks in codebase
Identify testing, linting, and deployment tooling
Match patterns to recommended skill templates
Match patterns to recommended agent templates
Present suggestions with priority and rationale
Generate approved tooling using other skills
limitations: Does not execute or install suggested tooling
Requires user approval before generating new skills

use_cases.title: Discover automation tools
use_cases.description: Analyze new codebase to find which custom skills and agents would improve your development workflow.

use_cases.title: Standardize team tooling
use_cases.description: Identify missing automation for team workflows like testing, code review, and deployment.

use_cases.title: Fill tooling gaps
use_cases.description: Detect areas lacking automation and suggest skills to reduce repetitive manual tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze project
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this codebase and suggest custom Claude Code skills and agents that would improve the development workflow.

prompt_templates.title: Check existing
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare my current .claude configuration against detected project patterns. What tooling am I missing?

prompt_templates.title: Generate skill
prompt_templates.prompt: A testing-code skill would help this project. Generate it using detected patterns: Jest framework, TypeScript, tests directory.

prompt_templates.title: Prioritize suggestions
prompt_templates.prompt: Prioritize the suggested skills and agents by impact. Which ones would save the most time if automated?

output_examples.input: Analyze this Python FastAPI project with pytest and suggest tooling
output: Gap analysis: No existing testing automation, no API test coverage

best_practices: Run analysis on fresh projects early to establish automation baseline
Review P1 suggestions first as they have highest impact
Check for overlap with existing .claude tooling before generating new items
anti_patterns: Suggesting generic skills without project-specific patterns
Skipping overlap detection with existing skills

faq.question: What tools does this skill work with?
faq.answer: Supports Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Provides recommendations for custom skills and agents compatible with all three.

faq.question: How many suggestions does it generate?
faq.answer: Maximum of 5 suggestions per category (skills and agents). Suggestions are prioritized by impact level (P1, P2, P3).

faq.question: Does it install the suggested tooling?
faq.answer: No. The skill presents suggestions and rationale. Users must approve generation. New tooling requires restart to become available.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill with no executable code. It only reads project structure for pattern detection.

faq.question: Why are no suggestions showing?
faq.answer: The skill only suggests when it detects clear patterns (like jest.config for testing). Add more files matching pattern categories for suggestions.

faq.question: How is this different from built-in agents?
faq.answer: Built-in agents are general-purpose. This skill recommends specialized automation tailored to your specific project patterns and detected workflows.
